messages.subject: MAGIC MILL DLX Bread Machine FOR SALE
messages.msgSnippet: I have a MAGIC MILL DLX 9000.  It is four years old. I bought it when I had 9 children all at home. Well, most of them are gone now and I m too busy to bake
messages.messageBody:
I have a MAGIC MILL DLX 9000. It is four years old. I bought it when I had
9 children all at home. Well, most of them are gone now and I'm too busy to
bake bread. I'd like to sell this one and buy something different.

I paid $429 for this. I still have the instructions. It will hold 8 quarts
in the stainless steel bowl. You can knead of to 23 cups of flour or 7 lbs
of flour. Up to 15 lbs of dough, all at one time. You can buy optional
attachments. This one comes with the standard beater, the dough hook and a
handy scraper to get all the dough from the bottom of the bowl. I used to
make 6 - 2 lb loaves of 110% whole wheat bread at one time.

You add your ingredients, let the mixer knead it. Put your dough in a bowl
to rise or directly into bread pans to rise and then bake. The mess stays
in the mixer bowl and is easy to clean up.

You can see pictures of my machine at
http://www201.pair.com/patspell/auctionpictures/auctionproducts/dlx1.jpg and

http://www201.pair.com/patspell/auctionpictures/auctionproducts/dlx2.jpg


The unit similar to the one in this picture http://www.magicmillusa.com/
and you can see all the parts that are available such as grinders, blenders
and such.

I want $250 for this machine plus $16 for shipping. Contact me at
pat@... if you are interested. I would love to take
payments but I just can't. I need the lump sum to buy a bread machine does
the baking too. Now that I don't need to bake nearly as much. It is in
excellent shape.

Thanks
Pat


*************************************
Pat Spelling
